Custom 404 Pages

Apr 6, 2016

You can now have custom 404 pages for your site!

Instead of responding with Dropbox’s error: file not found, you can create a 404.html file and put whatever message you like in there.

Here’s an example: https://jshawl.updog.co/non-existent-folder/

Have a 404 page you’d like to show off? let us know and we’ll feature it here!
